name: Windows Poop Edition 5
description:
NOTE: Windows PE 5 is currently in beta. Features are subject to change, and there may be some bugs. (oh wait, its Windows Poop Edition, of course there's gonna be bugs...)

Windows Poop Edition 5 is yet another release in CrapOS's never-ending Windows PE product line. It includes many new and exciting* features, such as:

  • Files on the desktop!
  • Improved(?) filesystem UI!
  • A functioning Chat application! Communicate with fellow Windows PE users in real time!
  • Looks different from Windows PE 4!

(NOTE: The features listed above are subject to change, as Windows PE 5 is still in beta.)
